verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> you the Lord <WH3050>: for it is good <WH2896> to sing praises <WH2167> unto our God <WH430>; for it is pleasant <WH5273>; and praise <WH8416> is fitting <WH5000>.
The Lord <WH3068> does build up <WH1129> Jerusalem <WH3389>: he gathers together <WH3664> the outcasts <WH1760> of Israel <WH3478>.
He heals <WH7495> the broken <WH7665> in heart <WH3820>, and binds up <WH2280> their wounds <WH6094>.
He tells <WH4487> the number <WH4557> of the stars <WH3556>; he calls <WH7121> them all by their names <WH8034>.
Great <WH1419> is our Lord <WH113>, and of great <WH7227> power <WH3581>: his understanding <WH8394> is infinite <WH4557>.
The Lord <WH3068> lifts up <WH5749> the meek <WH6035>: he casts <WH8213> the wicked <WH7563> down <WH8213> to the ground <WH776>.
Sing <WH6030> unto the Lord <WH3068> with thanksgiving <WH8426>; sing praise <WH2167> upon the harp <WH3658> unto our God <WH430>:
Who covers <WH3680> the heaven <WH8064> with clouds <WH5645>, who prepares <WH3559> rain <WH4306> for the earth <WH776>, who makes grass <WH2682> to grow <WH6779> upon the mountains <WH2022>.
He gives <WH5414> to the animal <WH929> his food <WH3899>, and to the young <WH1121> ravens <WH6158> which cry <WH7121>.
He delights <WH2654> not in the strength <WH1369> of the horse <WH5483>: he takes not pleasure <WH7521> in the legs <WH7785> of a man <WH376>.
The Lord <WH3068> takes pleasure <WH7521> in them that fear <WH3373> him <WH3176>, in those that hope in his mercy <WH2617>.
Praise <WH7623> the Lord <WH3068>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>; praise <WH1984> your God <WH430>, O Zion <WH6726>.
For he has strengthened <WH2388> the bars <WH1280> of your gates <WH8179>; he has blessed <WH1288> your sons <WH1121> inside you <WH7130>.
He makes <WH7760> peace <WH7965> in your borders <WH1366>, and fills <WH7646> you with the finest <WH2459> of the wheat <WH2406>.
He sends forth <WH7971> his commandment <WH565> upon earth <WH776>: his word <WH1697> runs <WH7323> very swiftly <WH4120>.
He gives <WH5414> snow <WH7950> like wool <WH6785>: he scatters <WH6340> the hoarfrost <WH3713> like ashes <WH665>.
He casts forth <WH7993> his ice <WH7140> like morsels <WH6595>: who can stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> his cold <WH7135>?
He sends out <WH7971> his word <WH1697>, and melts <WH4529> them <WH7307>: he causes his wind to blow <WH5380>, and the waters <WH4325> flow <WH5140>.
He shows <WH5046> his word <WH1697> unto Jacob <WH3290>, his statutes <WH2706> and his judgments <WH4941> unto Israel <WH3478>.
He has not dealt <WH6213> so with any nation <WH1471>: and as for his judgments <WH4941>, they have not known <WH3045> them <WH1984>. Praise you the Lord <WH3050>.
